These Pics Of Alia-Deepika & Ranveer-Ranbir Bonding Prove That Friendships Do Last In Bollywood
These Pics Of Alia-Deepika & Ranveer-Ranbir Bonding Prove That Friendships Do Last In Bollywood
In an industry where everything changes with the blink of an eye, not every friendship passes the test of time. The industry is competitive and ruthless and uncertainty remains the center point of it all. However, there have been examples recently that prove how with little effort and maturity, you can find your people to lean on!
Twitter
Be it being there for someone when they are receiving an award or just turning up at their film screenings to extend support, the trend seems to be changing and this is definitely a delightful change.
For instance, last night, at the Zee Cine Awards, Ranbir Kapoor-Ranveer Singh and Alia Bhatt-Deepika Padukone's reunion was all about hugs, kisses and lots of laughter.
While Deepika and Alia were seen posing for the paps, Ranveer's hug to Ranbir Kapoor after winning the best actor trophy is winning everyone's hearts! In case you are wondering what we are talking about, have a look at the pictures and videos.
